search-welcome: Start searching for Bible verses by entering keywords above.

signin.signup-invite: Don't have an account? Sign up now and get started!

error.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error.accountLocked: Account locked. Try again later or contact the system administrator at support@example.com.
error.loginFailed: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.userDuplication: A user with this email already exists. Please use a different email.
error.userNotCreated: The user account could not be created due to an unexpected error. Please try again later.
error.emailNotFound: No account is associated with this email address. Please check your email or sign up for a new account.
error.invalidPassword: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again or reset your password if you've forgotten it.
error.passwordMismatch: Password and confirm password do not match.
